title: Netherlands citizen's woman found dead in an apartment in Wellawatte
content: The body of a Dutch woman has been found at an apartment complex in Wellawatte last evening (24). The Police said the 66-year-old woman was found dead inside the washroom of an apartment.Preliminary investigations have revealed that the Dutch lady had been residing at the apartment on rent, along with a youth.It has been further revealed that she had been introduced to the youth through the social media platform TikTok.
